attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that many British parliamentarians of all walks have been dishonest in their financial matters in one way of other we call upon PM Gordon Brown to hold General Election immediately.
attributes.creator_name: Mr M.T.Gordon , Nominee Director of OFAPS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
